name: [Unstable] Beat Fighters
description:
Press space at the spot to land a beat, beats get faster after a 10 combo so watch out for that.

You can shoot two beats if you hit it perfectly.

CHEAT BUTTON: Press up to increase difficulty (REALLY BUGGY)

CONTROLS: Space bar.

Other Rules: Spamming space will reduce your health, but you can't die, I haven't added that at all. You have to press space on the "beat pad" to successfully shoot a bullet.
